title: A Bloody Lucky Day
description: An ordinary taxi driver who becomes entangled with a customer that turns out to be a serial killer.

title: A Killer Paradox
description: When one accidental killing leads to another, a college student finds himself stuck in an endless cat-and-mouse chase with a shrewd detective trying to capture him.

title: A Model Family
description: After unwittingly stealing money from a dangerous cartel, a professor finds the only way to save his family is by working as a drug courier, plunging him into Korea's seedy underbelly.

title: A Time Called You
description: A young woman, mourning the death of her boyfriend, is transported back in time as a high school student where she meets a student who looks confusingly like the deceased.

title: Aema
description: In 1980s Korea, a movie star and a starlet defy male-dominated industry rules and backstage corruption while filming the provocative "Madame Aema."

title: Alchemy of Souls
description: A powerful sorceress in a blind woman's body encounters a man from a prestigious family, who wants her help to change his destiny.

description: Netflix

description: Trapped students must escape their high school which has become ground zero for a zombie virus outbreak.

title: Bargain
description: Men are lured to a remote hotel, only to be caught in an organ trafficking ring. After a catastrophic earthquake, the survivors fight to escape.

description: A psychic veterinarian and a detective join forces to crack small-town cases, but their skills are tested as they unravel a mystery involving a serial killer.

title: Beyond the Bar
description: A young, rookie lawyer with a strong sense of justice joins a top law firm - navigating the complex legal world under a cold, demanding mentor.

title: Big Bet
description: The legendary king of the casino in the Philippines confronts unfortunate events; after getting tangled in a murder case, he is now faced with the ultimate bet with his life on the line.

description: Hulu

title: Big Mouth
description: Caught up in a murder case, an underperforming lawyer gets pegged as the notorious swindler, Big Mouse.

title: Black Knight
description: In a dystopian future devastated by air pollution, survival depends on a group of deliverymen known as the Black Knights who navigate the wastelands using unconventional means.

description: Released from prison a decade after the alleged murder of two high school friends, Jeong Woo must confront his past and the dark side of human nature that permeates his sleepy village.

title: Blood Free
description: Ending millions of years of humans eating animal meat, BF dominates the genetically engineered meat market. However, people are beginning to doubt the path taken by BF's CEO.

title: Bloodhounds
description: Two young boxers band together with a benevolent moneylender to take down a ruthless loan shark who preys on the financially desperate.

description: Netflix

title: Bon Appetit, Your Majesty
description: After time travelling to the Joseon era, a talented chef meets a tyrant king; her modern dishes captivate his palate, but royal challenges await her.

title: Business Proposal
description: In disguise as her friend, Ha-ri shows up on a blind date to scare away her friend's prospective suitor. However, plans go awry when he turns out to be Ha-ri's CEO and he makes a proposal.

title: Café Minamdang
description: A story about a former criminal profiler who now works as a fraudster posing as a fortune teller and the female detective who gets involved with him.

title: Call It Love
description: A woman decides to take revenge for the injustices she suffered when her family becomes homeless. Her plans change when her enemy turns out to be a lovable and gentle soul.

title: Castaway Diva
description: Fifteen years after being stranded on a remote island, an aspiring singer reenters society, stopping at nothing to pursue her dream of becoming a diva.

description: Fame. Money. Power. One young woman fights to become the next hottest celebrity in the glamorous yet scandalous world of influencers in Seoul.

title: Chicken Nugget
description: A woman steps into an odd machine and becomes a chicken nugget; now, it's up to her father and admirer to embark on a zany quest to bring her back.

title: Confidence Queen
description: The story of Yi-rang, a smart woman who becomes the ultimate con artist; she teams up with James and Gu-ho, working as a trio of swindlers, to expose scammers and take their ill-gotten gains.

title: Connect
description: A man is kidnapped by a gang of organ hunters; one of his eyes was transplanted into body of a serial killer and he now has terrible visions of attacks on the residents of Seoul.

title: Crazy Love
description: A math professor pretends he has amnesia after receiving death threats. His secretary, who has learned she doesn't have long to live, seizes the opportunity to declare herself his fiancé.

title: D.P.
description: A young private's assignment to capture army deserters reveals the painful reality endured by enlistees during their compulsory calls of duty.

title: D.P. Season 2
description: Netflix

title: Daily Dose of Sunshine
description: A kind-hearted nurse working in psychiatry goes above and beyond to be a ray of light for those under her care, despite the challenges coming her way.

title: Dear Hongrang
description: When a long-missing heir returns with lost memories, love and suspicion entwine; is he truly Hongrang, or a stranger disturbing hearts and family ties?

title: Doctor Lawyer
description: A medical drama of a surgeon who becomes a lawyer after a case of surgical malpractice.

title: Doona!
description: A student moves into the same shared house as a former idol who has taken early retirement. The student becomes increasingly interested in Doo-Na's mysterious life.

title: Dr. Brain
description: A brilliant brain scientist, who suffered a horrific personal tragedy, conducts "brain syncs" with the dead to access their memories for clues to uncover what happened to his family.

title: Dramaworld
description: Amazon Prime

title: Dramaworld Season 2
description: Amazon Prime

title: Dreaming of a Freaking Fairytale
description: Jae-rim, who dreams of becoming Cinderella, faces a challenging relationship after meeting and falling for Cha-min, the son of a wealthy family who does not believe in love.

description: Determined to escape a dead-end life, a gifted high school student turns to a life of crime to ensure he can pay for college.

description: Attorney Woo is a young lawyer with Asperger's syndrome who boasts a high IQ, impressive memory and creative thought process, but struggles with everyday interactions.

description: Netflix

description: Inside a national weather service, love proves just as difficult to predict as rain or shine for a diligent forecaster and her free-spirited co-worker.

description: A woman knows a secret about a series of disappearances in Gangnam but then vanishes herself. A detective, an outlaw, and a prosecutor pursue the truth for their own reasons.

description: After a millennium, a flamboyant genie returns to grant wishes to a stoic woman; can his magic turn her routine-bound world into one of love and fantasy?

description: A young woman joins forces with a UFO enthusiast to investigate her boyfriend's sudden disappearance and stumbles into a wild conspiracy.

description: Olympic medalists join the police force through a special recruitment program, trading medals for badges as they tackle violent crimes and injustices with their athletic skills.

description: As an asteroid hurtles towards Earth with nothing to stop it, one determined teacher fights to keep her former students safe, no matter the cost.

description: Netflix

description: A high school girl encounters a mysterious boy visiting a fairy with his mother. Despite falling for him instantly, she discovers his tragic fate. When he transfers to her class, she becomes determined to change his destiny.

description: After life's ups and downs, a loving couple separated by death reunites in heaven - only to discover he's in his thirties while she's in her eighties.

description: Unearthly beings deliver condemnations, sending individuals to hell and giving rise to a religious group founded on the idea of divine justice.

description: Kang Ha transfers to Jooshin High School, the most prestigious school in South Korea; however, behind his innocent smile lies a secret that will shatter the entire establishment.

description: At a crossroads, a dentist moves to a seaside village where she meets a handyman intent on helping his neighbors.

description: Netflix

description: A disgraced neurosurgeon performs illegal surgeries while confronting her dark past. When she meets her former mentor, a battle of power and revenge unfolds as she pushes ethical boundaries in pursuit of medical breakthroughs.

description: A tough judge balances her aversion to minor offenders with firm beliefs on justice and punishment as she tackles complex cases inside a juvenile court.

title: Karma
description: Bound by their harrowing destinies, a physician plagued by nightmares, a man shaken after his world was unexpectedly disrupted and a debtor drowning in private loans become caught in inescapable circumstances.

description: The tale of the mysterious figure of Ashin and the origins of the epidemic that revived the dead king and led to the devastation of the Joseon kingdom.

description: A woman can see the future when she kisses someone. One day she accidentally kissed her boss and saw that in the future they were lying in the same bed.

description: The living and the dead intersecting as this world and the afterlife are connected through a store selling lighting.

description: A chef opens a restaurant in the place where his twin sister disappeared. He starts to feel emotions that don't belong to him. It turns out that he feels everything a stranger feels.

title: Little Women
description: Sisters become embroiled in a major incident and face off against the wealthiest family in the nation.

title: Love Alarm
description: In a world where an app reveals nearby admirers, a high school girl faces young love and personal struggles while caught in a complex love triangle.

description: A sports romance unfolds as Park Tae Joon, drawn into badminton by the family business, and Park Tae Yang, a former Olympian with a troubled past, connect on a mixed doubles team.

description: A passionate architect loses his heart to a free-spirited woman and sets out to reunite with her on the streets of Seoul.

description: A fisherman as he discovers a treasure lost for generations at the bottom of the ocean. Taking a small part of it home for himself.

description: When a woman witnesses the affair between her best friend and her husband, and is murdered by them, she goes back in time to change her future and seek revenge.

title: Mask Girl
description: An office worker who is insecure about her looks becomes a masked internet personality by night until a chain of ill-fated events overtakes her life.

description: An ace lawyer and an eccentric public defender team up to solve a serial murder case, uncovering dark secrets and building trust along the way.

title: Melo Movie
description: A movie buff falls for an aspiring director, igniting a romance that fizzles out too soon; when their paths cross again, can love find its way back?

description: A young man with Asperger's and his uncle work as trauma cleaners, uncovering the stories of the deceased through their possessions and telling them to loved ones.

description: Teenagers with inherited superpowers, like flight or super strength, face powerful governments, hiding their abilities as their parents fight to protect them from exploitation.

description: A man plagued by misfortune and his ex, the unluckiest bride-to-be, are forced to accompany one another on the final journey of his life.

description: Due to various personal reasons, some of Yun Tae-o's friends move into his house, where they experience love, friendship and everything in between.

description: A lonely woman with face blindness finds the perfect companion upon getting to know a humanlike hologram modelled after its genius creator.

title: My Name
description: A woman infiltrates the police to avenge her father's murder, becoming a mole in a web of crime, betrayal, and complex alliances with a detective and a drug investigation unit.

title: Nevertheless,
description: A man who avoids relationships meets a woman skeptical of love, sparking a romance that challenges their opposing views on love and connection.

title: Newtopia
description: Amid a zombie outbreak, a soldier trapped on a skyscraper and his ex-girlfriend braving the streets fight to reunite. As chaos unfolds, love and survival hang in the balance.

title: Nine Puzzles
description: Jo I-na finds her uncle murdered beside a puzzle piece but can't explain her presence. Ten years later, as a criminal profiler, she investigates murders where victims are found with similar puzzle pieces.

description: A money-driven marketing professional arranges a fake wedding with a convenience store employee to secure a promotion, but real feelings develop between them as they play along.

description: Years after filming a viral documentary in high school, two former lovers get pulled back in front of the camera and into each other's lives.

title: Pachinko
description: A Korean immigrant family's saga spans four generations, beginning with a forbidden romance and unfolding across Korea, Japan, and America as they chase their dreams.

title: Parasyte: The Grey
description: People must rise to combat unidentified parasites after they violently take over human hosts and gain power.

description: Presents a collection of Sulli's interview clips pieced together to give an insight into the idol's mind, along with a short film starring her.

title: Pyramid Game
description: After being voted the least popular student and becoming the target of school violence, Su-ji sets out to climb to the top of the rankings.

description: A department store queen and a supermarket heir, facing a crumbling marriage, must confront their issues when the wife is diagnosed with brain cancer, leading to love and reconciliation.

title: Queen Woo
description: After the sudden death of the king, Queen Woo must marry one of her late husband's brothers within 24 hours to protect her life, family, and throne from power-hungry princes and tribes.

description: After a crisis of conscience, a powerful fixer helps a civil rights lawyer run for mayor and take down her former employer, using her skills to expose corruption and create a just world.

title: Race
description: Office politics take center stage as a dedicated marketer with no academic background and a smart, indifferent colleague navigate challenges to succeed in their company.

title: Remarriage and Desires
description: Through an exclusive matchmaking agency that caters to the rich, a divorcee plots revenge against her ex-husband's scheming mistress.

title: Resident Playbook
description: Set at the Jongno branch of Yulje Medical Center, the series follows the hospital lives and turbulent friendships of young obstetrics and gynecology residents who proudly enter the unpopular department in an era of low birth rates.

description: After her twin brother's mysterious death, Ok Chanmi transfers to his school and investigates a "hero" who avenges bullied students, suspecting a connection to her brother's death.

description: A coming-of-age story about two students at the Korean National Police University, navigating life's challenges, romance, and personal growth as they work to become full-fledged cops.

description: A veteran detective, days from retirement, is framed for a murder and blackmailed by the real killer. He teams up with colleagues to uncover the truth and clear his name.

description: A genius engineer uncovers dangerous secrets and meets a woman from the future who travels back to save him, sparking a perilous journey to uncover the truth.

description: In 1987 Seoul, a university student helps a bleeding man with a dangerous secret. Together, they defy fate to protect each other and their loved ones.

description: A college dormitory is home to students from around the world, as they make new friends, find new loves and have new experiences.

title: Somebody
description: A software developer and her friends get caught in a web of murder and crime involving the dating app she built and a mysterious man lurking nearby.

title: Song of the Bandits
description: In 1920s Gando, lawless bandits fight to protect their land and loved ones from the Japanese colonial army, risking their lives in an action-packed tale of loyalty and resistance.

description: Two best friends of twenty years move in together and start making music, but their close bond begins to blur the line between friendship and romance.

title: Sweet Home Season 3
description: Netflix

title: The 8 Show
description: Eight indebted individuals enter a mysterious game-show in an eight-story building, where they earn money over time, only to discover the harsh and dangerous reality behind the rules.

description: After the death of an unknown uncle, a woman inherits a burial ground and finds herself in the centre of a string of murders and dark secrets.

description: A genius actuary forms a team to develop divorce insurance, quantifying love and risk. As they tackle soaring divorce rates, unexpected relationships and romance unfold in this office rom-com.

description: Four best friends navigate the fashion world, balancing demanding jobs, romantic struggles, and wild nights, as they chase their dreams while surviving the industry's challenges.

description: A quiet life at a remote cottage is disturbed when a mysterious guest arrives, and supernatural events begin to unravel a tragic past, drawing the attention of the local police.

description: A woman, bullied in school, drops out and later becomes a teacher. When her tormentor's child becomes her student, she seeks revenge on those who caused her pain.

description: Netflix

description: In the Joseon Dynasty, a girl survives after being sent away as a baby. Years later, she takes her twin brother's place on the throne, hiding her true identity while falling for her teacher.

description: A school nurse with an unusual supernatural gift must protect high school students from monsters only she can see.

title: The Silent Sea
description: During a perilous 24-hour mission on the moon, space explorers try to retrieve samples from an abandoned research facility steeped in classified secrets.

description: A magician living in an abandoned theme park makes troubles disappear for a disenchanted teenager enduring harsh realities.

description: To create a top-tier trauma center, a war-seasoned doctor arrives — bringing his blunt but skilled ways to transform his team into life-saving mavericks.

description: A woman enters a 1-year contract marriage with a music producer grieving his ex-wife. A mysterious trunk reveals dark secrets about the marriage agency.

description: A whirlwind power clash between the prime minister and deputy prime minister unravels the day the president suffers an assassination attempt.

description: As illegal firearms flood into a gun-free South Korea, a resolute cop and a mysterious partner join forces to stop the chaos from sweeping the nation.

description: During the South Korean financial crisis, a teen fencer fights to join the national team, while a young man, whose family’s business collapses, rebuilds his life and becomes a sports reporter.

description: Set in the 1960s, this series follows two men—one a resilient survivor, the other an elite officer—navigating a turbulent era, forging a deep bond while striving to improve their country.

description: A spirited queen tries to rein in her rowdy sons in order to make one of them the next king of Joseon, while her competitors vie to snatch the throne.

description: A comedy-drama that tells the story of an investigative reporting crew centered on the team leader, Trigger, who is full of a sense of justice, and the PD, a fierce individualist who uncovers the truth behind mysterious events and saves a program that is on the verge of being abolished.

description: A police academy student, seeking justice for his mother's murder, becomes a vigilante, punishing criminals while hiding his identity from a relentless detective.

description: A Korean-Italian mafia lawyer returns to South Korea and teams up with a determined lawyer to bring justice to a ruthless conglomerate, using their own methods to fight corruption.

description: Netflix

description: In Jeju, a spirited girl and a steadfast boy's island story blossoms into a lifelong tale of setbacks and triumphs — proving love endures across time.
